text: Rodrigo Freitas (born 17 June 1998) is a Brazilian professional footballer who plays as a centre-back for São Paulo FC. ==Early career== Rodrigo Freitas joined São Paulo's youth ranks at age 14. Between 2017 and 2018, he was the captain of the U20 team. After his 20th anniversary, he was promoted to the senior team in 2018, but he hasn't made a single league appearance. ==Professional career== === Portimonense === On 25 June 2019, Rodrigo joined Primeira Liga club Portimonense on loan. He made his debut for the club on 19 August 2019 during a 2-1 league win over C.D. Tondela. ==References== ==External links== * * ZeroZero Profile Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:People from Salvador, Bahia Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Portimonense S.C. players Category:Primeira Liga players Category:Association football defenders Category:Brazilian expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Portugal
title: Rodrigo Freitas
